term.title: pattern recognition

item.text: Pattern recognition is the identification of patterns in large data sets, using appropriate mathematical methodology. Examples are principal component analysis (PCA), SIMCA, partial least squares (PLS) and artificial neural networks (ANN).

sources.item: PAC, 1997, 69, 1137. 'Glossary of terms used in computational drug design (IUPAC Recommendations 1997)' on page 1148 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199769051137)
